definition: lit. the night-blooming cactus shows once/flash in the pan (idiom)/short-lived
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: After the dazzling fireworks flower briefly as the broad-leaved epiphyllum, after the passion of vanity.
sentences.chinese: 烟火璀璨过后的昙花一现，激情过后的空虚失落。

sentences.english: The low inflation rate will be no flash in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 低通货膨胀率不会只是昙花一现。

sentences.english: The trendy rock group was only a flash - in - the - pan.
sentences.chinese: 新潮摇滚乐队只是昙花一现。

sentences.english: But as I said this morning, this can’t be a fleeting moment.
sentences.chinese: 但正如我今天上午所说，这不应当是昙花一现的瞬间。

sentences.english: It has become the symbol for all that is transient and evanescent in life.
sentences.chinese: 它已成为所有的符号是短暂的昙花一现的生活。

sentences.english: We're hoping that this is a long-term opportunity, and not just a flash in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望这是一个长远的机会，而不会只是昙花一现。

sentences.english: The upturn following a decline is often shortlived and prices might resume their decline.
sentences.chinese: 复苏后下降往往是昙花一现，价格可能恢复下降。

sentences.english: But emerging markets are prone to boom-and-bust cycles.
sentences.chinese: 但新兴市场很容易陷入昙花一现的轮回。

sentences.english: They are merely passers-by on the stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 他们不过是历史舞台上昙花一现的人物。

sentences.english: Cool, Lake painting wound, the fact bleak, flower briefly as the broad-leaved epiphyllum.
sentences.chinese: 微凉了，湖畔画伤，望断事实凄凉，昙花一现。

sentences.english: Who says this Fall's fabulous hairstyles can't last for multiple seasons?
sentences.chinese: 谁说这个秋季的超美发型只是昙花一现？

sentences.english: Are we passers-by in the life of each other?Is our love bound to be a flash-in-the-pan?
sentences.chinese: 难道你我真的是生命中的过客，在生命中昙花一现吗？

sentences.english: Without theoretical support the modernization of TCM could only be like a flower as the broad leaved Epiphyllum briefly.
sentences.chinese: 没有中医理论的支持，中医药现代化只能是昙花一现。

definition: lit. flowers in a mirror and the moon reflected in the lake (idiom)/fig. an unrealistic rosy view/viewing things through rose-tinted spectacles/also written 水月鏡花|水月镜花
see 黃粱夢|黄粱梦[huang2 liang2 meng4]
in the end/after all is said and done
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
to vanish without trace (idiom)/to lie low
one stumble, unable to rise (idiom); a setback leading to total collapse/ruined at a stroke/unable to recover after a minor hitch
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
lit. chrysanthemums after the Double Ninth Festival (idiom)/fig. outdated/thing of the past/dead letter
